QuestData.Title: More Than A Rock
QuestData.Description:
<The shards are smooth and slightly hot to the touch. Lightning sparks deep within their core.>
<Maybe Watu or Olekk would know more.>
<The thought of parting with the shard fills you with compulsion to hold the shard close. To keep it forever.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Stormtouched Shards to Watu.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Watu in Pinewood Post.
QuestData.RewardText: <Watu doesn't register your presence. He remains sitting, favoring the injured leg, and has his eyes closed.>
